sentences.sentence: She just laughed when she heard that the boss had made the assignment purposely.
sentences.translation: 当她听说老板是故意布置这个任务的时候，她只是笑了笑。

sentences.sentence: I purposely interrupt one of the access paths by pulling off an FC cable between the host and switch.
sentences.translation: 我故意拔掉主机与交换机之间的一根 FC 电缆，从而中断其中一条访问路径。
